import axios from'axios';// Action Types
export var FETCH_BOOK_DETAILS_REQUEST='FETCH_BOOK_DETAILS_REQUEST';export var FETCH_BOOK_DETAILS_SUCCESS='FETCH_BOOK_DETAILS_SUCCESS';export var FETCH_BOOK_DETAILS_FAILURE='FETCH_BOOK_DETAILS_FAILURE';// Action Creators
export var fetchBookDetailsRequest=function fetchBookDetailsRequest(){return{type:FETCH_BOOK_DETAILS_REQUEST};};export var fetchBookDetailsSuccess=function fetchBookDetailsSuccess(bookDetails){return{type:FETCH_BOOK_DETAILS_SUCCESS,payload:bookDetails};};export var fetchBookDetailsFailure=function fetchBookDetailsFailure(error){return{type:FETCH_BOOK_DETAILS_FAILURE,payload:error};};// Thunk to fetch book details
export var fetchBookDetails=function fetchBookDetails(bookId){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchBookDetailsRequest());axios.get("https://openlibrary.org/works/".concat(bookId,".json")).then(function(response){var bookDetails={description:response.data.description||'No description available.',averageRating:response.data.average_rating||'N/A',reviews:response.data.reviews||[]};dispatch(fetchBookDetailsSuccess(bookDetails));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(fetchBookDetailsFailure(error.message));});};};
